Name: Executive Office
column8: Sets company vision and strategy. Oversees all departments and major business decisions. Represents company to board and stakeholders. Manages executive communications.

Name: Strategic Planning
column8: Develops long-term business strategy and growth plans. Conducts market research and competitive analysis. Identifies new business opportunities and partnerships. Advises leadership on strategic initiatives.

Name: Finance Department
column8: Manages company budgets and financial planning. Processes payroll and accounts payable/receivable. Prepares quarterly reports and tax filings. Oversees audits and compliance.

Name: Accounting
column8: Handles day-to-day bookkeeping and ledger management. Reconciles accounts monthly. Manages vendor payments and customer invoicing. Maintains financial records and documentation.

Name: Treasury
column8: Manages cash flow and liquidity planning. Oversees investment strategies and banking relationships. Handles debt management and credit facilities. Monitors currency and interest rate risks.

Name: Operations
column8: Ensures smooth daily business functions. Manages facilities and office resources. Coordinates cross-department projects and initiatives. Handles vendor relationships and contracts.

Name: Information Technology
column8: Maintains company technology infrastructure. Provides technical support to employees. Manages software licenses and security protocols. Oversees system upgrades and data backups.

Name: Security Team
column8: Monitors network security and threat detection. Manages access controls and user permissions. Conducts security audits and employee training. Responds to security incidents and breaches.

Name: Software Development
column8: Builds and maintains internal software applications. Develops features for customer-facing products. Conducts code reviews and quality assurance. Manages development workflows and deployment pipelines.

Name: Facilities
column8: Manages office space and building maintenance. Coordinates with vendors for repairs and services. Oversees office supplies and equipment inventory. Handles space planning and employee moves.

Name: Marketing & Communications
column8: Develops brand strategy and messaging. Manages advertising campaigns across channels. Creates marketing materials and content. Analyzes market trends and competitive landscape.

Name: Digital Marketing
column8: Manages social media presence and engagement. Runs digital advertising campaigns and SEO. Optimizes website performance and user experience. Tracks digital analytics and conversion metrics.

Name: Corporate Communications
column8: Manages internal and external communications. Writes press releases and company announcements. Coordinates media relations and interviews. Maintains brand voice and messaging consistency.

Name: Human Resources
column8: Manages recruitment and onboarding processes. Administers employee benefits programs. Handles employee relations and conflict resolution. Ensures compliance with labor laws and regulations.

Name: Talent Acquisition
column8: Sources and screens job candidates. Coordinates interviews and candidate assessments. Manages job postings and employer branding. Tracks recruiting metrics and pipeline analytics.
